entry.title: https://github.com/MinaProtocol/mina
entry.content: Mina is a cryptocurrency protocol with a constant size blockchain, improving scaling while maintaining decentralization and security.

entry.title: https://github.com/coq/coq
entry.content: Coq is a formal proof management system. It provides a formal language to write mathematical definitions, executable algorithms and theorems together with an environment for semi-interactive development of machine-checked proofs.

entry.title: https://github.com/ocaml/dune
entry.content: A composable build system for OCaml.

entry.title: https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml
entry.content: The core OCaml system: compilers, runtime system, base libraries

entry.title: https://github.com/semgrep/ocaml-tree-sitter-core
entry.content: OCaml code generator and runtime library for handling typed tree-sitter CSTs

entry.title: https://github.com/semgrep/semgrep
entry.content: Lightweight static analysis for many languages. Find bug variants with patterns that look like source code.

entry.title: https://github.com/terrateamio/terrateam
entry.content: Terrateam is an open-source GitOps CI/CD platform for automating infrastructure workflows. It integrates with GitHub to orchestrate Terraform, OpenTofu, CDKTF, Terragrunt, and Pulumi operations via pull requests.
